hydra:supportedProperty.hydra:title: isDefault
hydra:supportedProperty.hydra:description:
It's important to keep the getter for isDefault property,
otherwise Api Platform will be not able to get the value in the response,
in other words don't rename by IsDefault().

hydra:supportedProperty.hydra:title: entityTypes
hydra:supportedProperty.hydra:description: Get entity types for which reindexing should occur.

hydra:supportedProperty.hydra:title: indexNames
hydra:supportedProperty.hydra:description: Get the list of index names created so far by the self-reindex.
